The King of Fighters XIII

link.Abstract: With its expansive and highly detailed environments, innovative character creation, and a story that is fit for the silver screen, this game is everything you've been waiting for and so much more.
link.title: Review: The Elder Scrolls V: Skyrim

link.Abstract: The game features well-crafted adventure, lovable characters and innovative controls.
link.title: Review: The Legend of Zelda: Skyward Sword

content.div:
Platforms: X360, PS3

The Deal: The "King of Fighters" franchise has been around for more than 15 years, pitting martial artists from around the world against one another in deadly combat. Now the action's back with lucky number 13, as a new roster of warriors faces off with hopes of only one thing: victory.

"The King of Fighters XIII" doesn't deviate off the genre's path too much, offering a basic arcade mode while giving perfectionists a chance to hone their skills in tutorial and mission modes. The game truly begins to shine in its story mode. This gameplay mode still brings you the martial arts, but with it come the dialogue, cut scenes and drama that the series is known for. Once you've met with the game's conclusion, start over and try it again from a new perspective with different choices, and you'll experience a completely different story.

Thanks to its roster of more than 30 characters to choose from and an engaging story mode to experience, it's safe to say that "The King of Fighters XIII" would be a great addition to any fighting fan's library of games.

link.title: Skyrim
Follow Canada.com Tech on Twitter

link.Abstract: We choose ten big blockbuster video games that will please any gamer this holiday season.
link.title: The top ten video games this holiday season
Video: The Elder Scrolls V: Skyrim

link.Abstract: The fifth installment in the series, Skyrim takes place two hundred years following the events of 2006’s Oblivion. Continuing the tradition of previous installments, players assume the role of an unknown prisoner, this time slated for execution. Your character also learns that Skyrim has become engulfed in a civil war, which is the final event prophesied by the Elder Scrolls before the return of the Nordic god of destruction, who will descend on the Earth in the form of an unstoppable dragon. That is, unless you can stop it.
link.title: Video: 7 Things You Should Know About The Elder Scrolls V: Skyrim
